name: libmetatag
short_description: libmetatag is designed to provide a C library to allow programs to read and write various forms of metadata in audio files, such as MP3, Ogg Vorbis, iTunes AAC, and WMA files, as well as utilizing MusicBrainz to query for CD audio metadata.
